site.title: OpenedFile - Open Any File in Your Browser
site.description: Free browser-based file converter. Open HEIC, WebP, winmail.dat and more. Your files never leave your device.
site.tagline: Open unopenable files. In your browser. Instantly.

home.hero_description: Free, private file conversion tools that run entirely in your browser. No uploads, no servers, no risk.
home.tools_section_description: Choose a tool to get started. All processing happens on your device.

webp.title: WebP to JPG/PNG
webp.description: Convert WebP images to widely compatible JPG or PNG format. Adjust quality settings for the perfect balance.

heic.title: HEIC to JPG
heic.description: Convert iPhone HEIC/HEIF photos to JPG. Open your iOS photos on any device or platform.

winmail.title: Open winmail.dat
winmail.description: Extract and view contents of winmail.dat email attachments from Microsoft Outlook.

privacy_badge.text: Your files never leave your device
privacy_badge.tooltip: All processing is done locally in your browser. No files are uploaded to any server.

footer.tagline: Browser-based file tools. Private. Free. Fast.
